ygData.messageBody:
hehe..been carrying one for a while now....puttin it in the vault. Got it off a Bixie in EC...guess its a druid quest item. If any of you druids on Fennin Ro need this gimme a tell...i'm in the Fay region. Also have a Shiny Lore Card and Rondo Tongue...I find these items useful for weight...hehe. Glad to give them away...just cluttering up the garage <smile>.

Skyburst
Fennin Ro
----- Original Message -----
From: Mikaela
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 5:31 PM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Qtn about Quest item


On what critter is the case of jumjum juice found? How frequently is it found and who do you give it to after you get it?
